title: Through Sorrow I Found Me..through Love I Saw Me!!!
description: Trials and tribulations and searching for answersâ€¦they are always just beyond our reach until we reach that place of total acceptance of ourselves. Walk with me through my journey to ME. Through sorrow I found a place of confusion and misunderstanding and pain. I chose to blame others around me instead of looking within myself to not only find peace but forgiveness. Walk with me through this journey of ultimate forgiveness and acceptance. See life full of childhood demons that took me almost 30 years to release. This is my story about hurt, betrayal, fear, and ultimately confronting all the hurts around me and within me. Through love I finally truly saw ME!
author: Monica L. Miller
